long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CPE Wiz: The Ultimate Chrome Extension for Certified Public Accountants

Are you a Certified Public Accountant striving to maintain your license with CPE credits? Say goodbye to the constant worry of missing attendance prompts during your online CPE courses. Introducing CPE Wiz, the essential Chrome extension designed specifically for CPAs to streamline and simplify the process of earning and tracking CPE credits.

Why Choose CPE Wiz?

Automatic Attendance
Never miss a CPE credit again. CPE Wiz automatically clicks attendance buttons during your online webcasts, ensuring you stay compliant with your CPE requirements without the hassle of constantly monitoring prompts.

Supports Major Providers
Seamlessly integrates with leading CPE providers, including Surgent CPE, Becker, and AICPA. Enjoy a smooth and uninterrupted learning experience across all your preferred platforms.

Stress-Free Learning
Focus on what truly matters – your learning. Let CPE Wiz handle attendance prompts so you can concentrate on absorbing the course material, free from the stress of missing crucial credits.

Awake Mode
Enable the “Awake Mode” feature to prevent your computer from going into sleep mode during your CPE sessions. Maintain an active session throughout, ensuring you receive all your credits without any interruptions.

User-Friendly and Reliable
Designed with CPAs in mind, CPE Wiz is easy to install and simple to use. Whether you’re attending a webinar or an online course, our extension guarantees a reliable performance, keeping your professional development on track.

Key Features:

	•	Automatic Attendance: Clicks attendance buttons for you during online webcasts.
	•	Provider Support: Compatible with Surgent CPE, Becker, and AICPA.
	•	Awake Mode: Prevents your computer from sleeping during sessions.
	•	Stress-Free Learning: Focus on learning while we handle the attendance.

Download CPE Wiz Today

Transform your CPE credit management with CPE Wiz. Stay compliant effortlessly and enhance your learning experience. Download CPE Wiz now from the Chrome Web Store and take the first step towards stress-free CPE compliance.

Experience the ease and reliability of CPE Wiz and never worry about missing a CPE credit again!

Download now and see the difference for yourself.
